title: Spawn drag at the top side of map
body:
I don't think top needs a buff, all you need to do is to give some chance to spawn drag at top side of the map some time in the game.
In this case, the top will have more impact on the game.

Rift should be spawn at the opposite side of the drag in the map

we can possibly do this randomly or alternatively. 

What do you think?

replies.body: that change nothing coz this  adc and supp will force all toplaners to go bot insted.There is only one fair solution, delete both drake and herald
or, better yet, delete all marksmen!
Why not just push both objectives closer to the center of the map? Then we can all play around mid instead of bot

If they make it so that there is a obvious time when the dragon spawns top then the botlaners will just rotate top for it.


If itÂ´s random its RNG which on the other hand easily goes sour as well.

As previously stated swapping the position of dragon with Herald would just cause people to lane swap. Changes need to happen that ideally only affect the top side of the map without leaving the bottom untouched, or buff the champions that would go top systemically.

 I think riot is making steps in the right direction with changes such as the melee damage to tower increase. But they are definately being very cautious about unfortunately
